ValidationRule.description: Forces Event as the only available option for Audio Type when RT Audio Service Level is Operator-Assisted Direct and L3 is the Booked With provider.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "Level 3"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Premium"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( GX_Event_Type__c , "Event")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Operator Assisted Premium events booked with L3 can only have an Audio Type of Event. Please make the necessary changes and save the record again.
